content.rendered:
We are very happy to introduce our new weekly valuation discussion, where we compare current valuations with our Valutico Capital Markets tool:

Our first company is …. Shopify!

After announcing their new cooperation with Facebook, their stock price is skyrocking 🚀🚀🚀140% in the last two months

–> Todays Market Cap: $93,02B
–> Valuticos Valuation: $30,07B

What do you think? Will it reach $100 billion in Market Cap soon or is Shopify overvalued?

excerpt.rendered: We are very happy to introduce our new weekly valuation […]
